rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know that Koikoi is the type
to easily fall in love with Drivers, mo?

rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0002
rows.name:
After falling for all sorts of Drivers,
Koikoi has finally discovered a certain
trend, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0003
rows.name:
People with courage often have
fire or water element Blades, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Next, compassionate people often have
earth or lightning element Blades, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0005
rows.name:
And honest people often have
wind or ice element Blades, mo.

rows.label: tlk42450111_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Moh?!
I need to stop chatting and get back to work,
so many customers are here, mo?!
